entity.label: Account name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for this account.

validators.errorMsg: Length of Account name should be between 1 and 50
Account name must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.

entity.label: Username
entity.help: Enter the username for this account.

validators.errorMsg: Length of username should be between 1 and 200

entity.label: Password
entity.help: Enter the password for this account.

validators.errorMsg: Length of password should be between 1 and 8192

entity.label: Cortex: Max jobs
entity.help: Maximum number of jobs returned

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: Cortex: Sort jobs
entity.help: Sort Cortex jobs by

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: TheHive: Default instance
entity.help: Once you've added one instance, you can set here its ID in order to set it by default for alerts if the parameter is set accordingly

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: TheHive: Max cases
entity.help: Maximum number of cases returned

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: TheHive: Sort cases
entity.help: Sort TheHive cases by

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: TheHive: Max alerts
entity.help: Maximum number of alerts returned

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: TheHive: Sort alerts
entity.help: Sort TheHive alerts by

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: TheHive: TTP Catalog name
entity.help: Please indicates the default TTP catalog you want to use in your TheHive instance. This parameter is global over all instances.

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: TheHive: Attachment prefix
entity.help: Please indicates a prefix used for the attachment added to the alert/case.

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: TheHive: Max retry
entity.help: Please indicates how many times maximum the creation of alert or case shall be performed in case of error.

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: Splunk ES: Alerts index
entity.help: (Only for Adaptive Response in Splunk ES) Specify the index where you want to store alerts

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: Name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for the data input

validators.errorMsg: Input Name must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.
Length of input name should be between 1 and 100

entity.label: Interval
entity.help: Time interval of input in seconds.

validators.errorMsg: Interval must be an integer.
Length of index name should be between 1 and 80.

entity.label: Instance ID
entity.help: Indicate which instance to use (Set the "id" provided under "Instances"). You can use "<default>" to set automatically the ID to the default set parameter in the configuration page.

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: Type
entity.help: Indicates which kind of logs data you want to recover

entity.label: Additional information
entity.help: Indicates if you want to recover additional data from the standard logs

entity.label: Date
entity.help: Indicates if you want to recover your logs based on the last created or updated date

entity.label: Max size for values
entity.help: Indicates what is the maximum size/length for the values (will be truncated after this value)

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: Fields removal
entity.help: Indicates a list of fields, separated by a comma, representing the path in the dictionnary (such as 'field1.subfield1') that should be removed from the original event

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: Backfill: Start date
entity.help: Indicates which timestamp in seconds should be used as the start date for the first call

validators.errorMsg: Interval must be an integer.

entity.label: Backfill: End date
entity.help: Indicates which timestamp in seconds should be used as the end date (no more log collection will be performed after this date is reached)

validators.errorMsg: Interval must be an integer.
